short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allows you to mark which past papers you have completed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Physics & Math Tutor Marker: A Comprehensive Exam Preparation Tool

Physics & Math Tutor Marker is a browser extension designed to enhance the exam preparation process for students. This tool empowers users to efficiently manage their past papers, providing a structured and organized approach to progress tracking. With its user-friendly interface and intuitive features, students can seamlessly monitor their performance and maximize their study efforts.

KEY FEATURES:

- SMART CHECKBOXES: Physics & Math Tutor Marker offers a clear and systematic way to mark the status of each past paper. Users can utilize smart checkboxes to categorize papers as "completed," "in progress," or "pending," enabling them to maintain a comprehensive overview of their exam preparation progress.

- SEAMLESS SYNCHRONIZATION: Physics & Math Tutor Marker ensures seamless synchronization of data across devices. This feature allows students to access their progress information from multiple platforms, ensuring continuous monitoring and study planning without any disruption.

- DATA SECURITY AND PRIVACY: Upholding the highest standards of security and privacy, all user data remains confidential, and no personally identifiable information is collected during usage.
